body_html: I removed it because I wanted to clean up the UI, and because there's nothing special about using underscores rather than slashes. The fix is it replace underscores with slashes in your summary names.

body: I removed it because I wanted to clean up the UI, and because there's nothing special about using underscores rather than slashes. The fix is it replace underscores with slashes in your summary names.
